title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw, 32 oz – Dreamy Field

Stay hydrated in style with the Owala FreeSip 32 oz insulated stainless steel water bottle. Designed for sports, travel, and everyday adventures, it features the signature FreeSip spout with a built‑in straw for sipping and a wide swig opening for easy gulps—your choice, every time. Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours, while the push-button lid with a secure lock helps prevent leaks and keeps the spout protected on the go. Finished in the calming Dreamy Field colorway, this bottle blends function with a sleek look you’ll reach for daily.

Key features:
- 32 oz capacity, also available in 24 oz and 40 oz sizes.
- Double-wall insulated stainless steel keeps beverages cold for up to 24 hours.
- FreeSip spout: sip through the integrated straw or tilt to swig from the wide opening.
- Push-button lid with lock; protective, splash-resistant design.
- Carry loop doubles as a lock and makes it easy to grab and go.
- Wide opening fits ice cubes and simplifies filling.
- Cup/bottle is hand-wash only; lid is dishwasher safe (top rack).
- BPA- and phthalate-free materials.
- Not for use with hot liquids.
- Limited lifetime warranty.

What’s in the box:
- Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle, 32 oz, Dreamy Field.
- Push-button locking lid with integrated straw and carry loop.

Perfect for:
- Workouts, hikes, commuting, travel, and everyday hydration where cold performance and convenience matter.
